TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void HttpContinueDelegate(int StatusCode, WebHeaderCollection httpHeaders);
.class public auto ansi sealed HttpContinueDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub HttpContinueDelegate(StatusCode As Integer, httpHeaders As WebHeaderCollection)
public delegate void HttpContinueDelegate(int StatusCode, WebHeaderCollection ^ httpHeaders);

param.name: StatusCode
param.span: 來自伺服器的 HTTP 狀態數值。

span.span: The numeric value of the HTTP status from the server.

param.name: httpHeaders
param.span: 以來自伺服器的 100-Continue 回應所傳回的標頭。

span.span: The headers returned with the 100-continue response from the server.

summary.span: 表示方法，這個方法會在用戶端接收到持續回應時告知呼叫端。

span.span: Represents the method that notifies callers when a continue response is received by the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用指定 HTTP 100 時要呼叫的回呼方法-繼續從伺服器收到回應。Use to specify the callback method to be called when an HTTP 100-continue response is received from the server. 當集合，會呼叫此委派每當第一個通訊協定類型的回應收到。When set, the delegate is called whenever the first protocol response of type is received. 這是 1.1 版的行為變更架構。This is a change from the behavior of the version 1.1 Framework. 事件處理常式必須宣告相同的參數做為。Your event handler must declare the same parameters as the . > [!NOTE] > `StatusCode` 一定是。`StatusCode` is always . 用戶端想要顯示的狀態，正在從伺服器接收資料時，這非常有用。This is useful when the client wants to display the status of data being received from the server.
